  2. Michael Dell's net worth sinks the most in a single day, falling by $11.7 billion after shares of his company suffer record selloff on weak revenue  Fortune
  3. Jim Cramer explains why Dell is a buy on the dip  CNBC
  4. Dell's $3.8 Billion AI Server Backlog Fails to Impress Investors  Bloomberg
  5. Palantir Stock Investors Have Reason to Cheer  Yahoo Finance
